name: Split Soldiers
description:
This is a fast-paced splitscreen multiplayer deathmatch of up to four Drone Soldiers (players) shooting eachother, the one with the highest score wins.

The Matches are customizable by choosing what powerups spawn ingame, or selecting the length of the match and etc.

In-Game collectable powerups include:

1. Healing PowerUp (Chance of Spawning: Common)

2. Aimbot (Chance of Spawning: Very Rare)

3. Fast Fire (Chance of Spawning: Uncommon)

More will be added...

Controls:

Move around: WASD keys / Controller Joystick.

Shoot: Left Click / Right Controller Trigger.

Shoot Double Grenade: Right Click / Left Controller Trigger.

Mid-air Double Dash: Left Shift key / X button on xbox controller or square in playstation controller.

Double Jump: Space key / A button in xbox controller or X in playstation controller.

Try it!

I mean, why not?

If any thoughts or ideas, just leave it in the discussion board section.

Enjoy! :)
